headline: Jim Cramer Says Wells Fargo (WFC) “Deserves to be Let Out of the Doghouse”
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Put These 14 Stocks Under the Microscope. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE:WFC) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discusses. Discussing how deregulation would be good for companies, Cramer mentioned Wells Fargo & Company (NYSE:WFC) […]

headline: S&P Global Upgrades WFC Outlook to Positive on Asset Cap Removal
summary: S&P Global upgrades Wells Fargo's outlook to positive and affirms BBB+ long-term issuer rating, citing stronger controls and asset cap removal.
